When my membership upgrade request is approved.
This email is sent to members when their request for Membership Upgrade is approved by admin.
Your membership upgrade request is approved

[header]

Congratulations!! Your request for Membership Upgrade has been approved. Now you can enjoy the benefits of this new member level. 

[footer]

When my membership upgrade request is rejected.
This email is sent to members their request for Membership Upgrade is Rejected by admin.
Your membership upgrade request is rejected.

[header]

Sorry, Your request for Membership Upgrade has been rejected. Please try again. 

[footer]
SES - Credits - New Membership Upgrade Request
This email is sent to admin when a member on site requests upgrade membership in exchange of credit points.

[header]

 [owner_title] has requested to upgrade the Membership Level in exchange of credit plugins.

Go to the admin panel to take appropriate action on this request.

[footer]
SES - Credits - User received Credit points
This email is sent to members when they receive credit points from other members on your site.

[header]

 Congratulations!! You have been received [point] Credit points from [sender_title].

[footer]
This email is sent to admin when a member purchases credit points.
A member has purchased credit points.

[header]

 [owner_title] has purchased credit points from your website. Please check the details in admin panel.

[footer]

column1: Site Admin has been sent you {item:$object} point.
column2: Site Admin has been sent you {item:$object} point.

SES - Credits - Admin sent credit points to member
This message is sent to members when you send credit points to them from admin panel.
Admin has sent Reward Points to you.
[header] Congratulations!! You have been received [point] Reward Points from: http://[host][object_link]. [message] [footer]
This email is sent to members when their invited referrals join this website through their referral links.
You have received new Referral points.

[header]

Congratulation!! You have received [point] referral points as someone has joined through your referral link. Please check your referral points received in your Credit balance. 

[footer]
SES - Credits - Purchasing Credits Points Successful
This email is sent to member(s) when a member purchased credit points and transaction is successful.

[header]

You have successfully purchased [point] credit points. Please check your transactions.

[footer]
